function.name: triangle_properties.get
function.description: Retrieve the dimensions, such as area and perimeter, of a triangle if lengths of three sides are given.

side1.description: The length of first side of the triangle.

side2.description: The length of second side of the triangle.

side3.description: The length of third side of the triangle.

get_area.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the area of triangle. Default is true.

get_perimeter.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the perimeter of triangle. Default is true.

get_angles.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the internal angles of triangle. Default is true.

function.name: circle_properties.get
function.description: Retrieve the dimensions, such as area and circumference, of a circle if radius is given.

radius.description: The length of radius of the circle.

get_area.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the area of circle. Default is true.

get_circumference.description: A flag to determine whether to calculate the circumference of circle. Default is true.

function.name: calculate_triangle_area
function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.

unit.description: The unit of measure (defaults to 'units' if not specified)
